entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as not looking happy at all. He is visible over the heads of some excited first-years and seems to be trying to get near enough to start telling them off.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as nudging Ron in the ribs and nodding in Percy's direction. He is also mentioned as calling back to Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as getting the point at once when Harry nods in Percy's direction. He is also mentioned as being nudged by Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as wearing a scowl just like Percy's.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is mentioned at the beginning of the text as 'T HE  WHOMPING  WILLOW 67'.

relationships.description: Harry and Percy are described as having a gaze, with Harry nodding in Percy's direction.
